common.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again.
common.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

landing.heroDescription: Bashert connects families and individuals at simchas and community events, guided by professional shadchanim — exactly as it should be.
landing.whyDescription: A platform built from the ground up for the Orthodox community, with respect for the traditional process.
landing.feature1Description: Profiles are accessible only within events and simchas — just like real-world encounters.
landing.feature2Description: Create professional profile cards that can be reused across different events.
landing.feature3Description: Every interest request goes through a professional shadchan — not a dating app.
landing.feature4Description: The system automatically detects when both sides express mutual interest.
landing.howDescription: Four simple steps to begin your journey
landing.step1Description: Create an account and choose your role — profile creator, shadchan, or organizer.
landing.step2Description: Build a detailed profile card with all relevant information.
landing.step3Description: Receive an invitation code from the event organizer and join the simcha.
landing.step4Description: Browse profiles and send interest requests — the shadchan will guide the process.
landing.ctaDescription: Join Bashert today and start finding shidduchim at upcoming simchas.
landing.footerTagline: Event-based shidduch platform for Orthodox communities
landing.emailSentFrom: This message was sent from the Bashert system

auth.loginDescription: Enter your login credentials to sign in
auth.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
auth.loginError: An error occurred during login. Please try again.
auth.registerDescription: Create a new account to start using the platform
auth.emailAlreadyRegistered: This email address is already registered. Try logging in.
auth.registerError: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.
auth.registerSuccessMessage: We've sent you a verification email. Please check your inbox and click the verification link.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome to Bashert. Manage your profiles and events.
dashboard.noActiveEvents: No active events at the moment
dashboard.quickActionsDescription: Start building your presence on Bashert

profile.title: Profile Cards
profile.description: Manage your profile cards. You can create cards for yourself or for family members.
profile.photoUrlHelp: Enter a link to a profile photo
profile.additionalInfoPlaceholder: Additional information you'd like to share
profile.createDialogDescription: Fill in the details to create a profile card. You can create cards for yourself or for family members.
profile.noProfilesDescription: Create your first profile card to start participating in events

event.title: Events
event.description: Join events with an invitation code and browse profiles of other participants.
event.joinEventDescription: Enter the event code you received from the organizer
event.joinSuccess: Event found! Redirecting you to profile assignment...
event.joinError: No event found with this code. Please check the code and try again.
event.noEventsDescription: Join an event with an invitation code or create a new event to get started
event.eventNotFoundDescription: The event may have been removed or you don't have access to it.
event.participating: You are participating in this event
event.someProfilesParticipating: Some of your profiles are already participating in the event
event.createEventDialogDescription: Set up event details. After creation you'll receive a join code to share with participants.
event.preAccessDescription: How many hours before the event can participants browse profiles
event.postAccessDescription: How many hours after the event can participants send interest requests
event.matchmakerEmailDescription: If you'd like to assign a shadchan to this event, enter their email address
event.createProfileFirst: Please create a profile card first
event.joinWithProfile: Join the event with your profile
event.selectProfileForEvent: Select a profile to participate in the event

browse.title: Browse Profiles
browse.noProfilesDescription: No profiles match the selected filter. Try changing the criteria.
browse.noRequestsDescription: Browse profiles and express interest to see your requests here.

matchmaker.title: Shadchan Dashboard
matchmaker.description: Manage interest requests and track matches in your assigned events.
matchmaker.noAssignedEventsDescription: When organizers assign you to events, they will appear here.
matchmaker.requestsDescription: Manage interest requests and approve matches
matchmaker.noRequestsYetDescription: When participants send interest requests in this event, they will appear here.
matchmaker.noMatchingResultsDescription: Try changing the filter to see more results.

organizer.title: Organizer Dashboard
organizer.description: Create and manage events, assign shadchanim, and distribute invitation codes.
organizer.noEventsDescription: Create your first event and start inviting participants

errors.pageErrorDescription: An error occurred while loading the page. Try again or return to the home page.

email.interestConfirmationBody: The interest request from <highlight>{requester}</highlight> to <highlight>{target}</highlight> at event <highlight>{event}</highlight> was sent successfully.
email.interestConfirmationFollowUp: The assigned shadchan will review the request and be in touch with you.
email.newRequestBody: A new interest request was received at event <highlight>{event}</highlight>:
email.newRequestAction: Login to the shadchan dashboard to review and handle the request.
email.newRequestSubject: Bashert - New Interest Request at Event {event}
email.approvalBody: Good news! An interest request regarding you has been approved.
email.approvalDetail: <highlight>{requester}</highlight> expressed interest in you at event <highlight>{event}</highlight> and the request was approved by the shadchan.
email.loginForDetails: Login to the system for more details.
email.statusChangeBody: The status of your interest request to <highlight>{target}</highlight> at event <highlight>{event}</highlight> has been updated to: <highlight>{status}</highlight>

metadata.title: Bashert
metadata.description: Event-based shidduch platform for Orthodox communities. Discover shidduchim at simchas and community events.
metadata.eventDescription: Manage events and join new events
metadata.eventDetailDescription: View event details, browse profiles, and express interest
metadata.browseDescription: Browse participant profiles at the event
